title: choccoMans's Loveliest of Lovely Author Pages
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]

[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]


[[div class="blockquote" style="border-radius: 10px; margin: 10px"]]
[[=]]
+++ {{**Total Rating:**}}

+ [[size 250%]] {{**+254**}} [[/size]]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote" style="border-radius: 10px; margin: 10px"]]
[[=]]

+ {{**[[[Chairs]]]**}}

[[module ListPages name="Chairs"]]
//(+%%rating%%)//
[[/module]]

[[/=]]
[[/div]]
@@@@

[[=]]
+ About me
[[/=]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
Hi! I'm [[*user choccoMan]]. I am a connoisseur of cringe, and an avid collector of dust.

[[include component:image-block name=pfp.png|caption=Artist's rendition of my profile picture cos I can't verify whether it's CC and I don't want Doctor Cimmerian to find out where I live (yes, he actually did that). I think I'll name him Eugenius Quasimodo Lawchild.|width=300px]]

I tend to mostly write tales and post art, but I do happen to take a cheeky visit to SCP land every once in a while. This page is dedicated to storing my written work, including my SCPs, tales, GoI formats, and other doodads and hooligans. I have a separate page for my art, which would be linked **here** if I actually had one.

My favorite genres are absurdism, surreal horror, surreal anything and bureaucratic horror. My favorite author is [[*user Billith]], and my favourite SCPs are [[[SCP-4231]]], [[[SCP-7999]]] and [[[SCP-7000]]].

I'm bisexual and aromantic.
[[/div]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[=]]
+ SCPs
[[/=]]

[[tabview]]
[[tab Order Chronologically]]

[[module ListPages name="SCP-8886"]]
+++ [[[SCP-8886]]] - ##brown|INRI## [[size 60%]]//(+%%rating%%)//[[/size]]
[[/module]]

> //Save your breath, brother, for this is not the final punishment. If you truly haven't sinned, the Lord will know.//

[[collapsible show="+ Author's Commentary" hide="- collapse"]]
My first SCP, after like 5 failed attempts. The funny thing is, this should have not floated under any circumstance. It was a rewrite of an article that failed to float in //Series 1//, it was hastily written on my phone over the course of two days, and when I posted it I was in such a rush I had foregone all the proper processes of posting to the wiki.

And yet, it floated. And now we're here. :3
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ Praise for SCP-8886" hide="- collapse"]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
 I love how this SCP depicted Jesus Christ.

[[>]]
- //Account deleted//
[[/>]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
Brilliantly haunting and well written. I am left with questions and that fact has me satisfied with my reading. Horrible, terrifying, awe inspiring. 10/10 I am speechless.

[[>]]
- [[*user Fernlom]]
[[/>]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
Just WOW.

[[>]]
- [[*user yukizame]]
[[/>]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
Found this one pretty enjoyable. It was a freaky read for sure.

[[>]]
[[*user Yossipossi]]
[[/>]]
[[/div]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[=]]
+ Tales
[[/=]]

[[tabview]]
[[tab Order Chronologically]]

[[module ListPages name="After the Outing"]]
+++ [[[After the Outing]]] [[size 60%]]//(+%%rating%%)//[[/size]]
[[/module]]

//- Collaboration with [[*user Mister_Toasty]]//
//- Public Domain Contest entry (disqualified)//

> //REST IN RUINS.//

[[collapsible show="+ Author's Commentary" hide="- collapse"]]
While I was still flailing my arms around trying to figure out what my entry to the Public Domain contest was gonna be, [[*user Mister_Toasty]] approached me and roped me into his mad quest to kill every public domain character. He //said// it was gonna be a quick, 1-hour job, but little did I know I would spend the next 8 days busting sick rhymes with him.

We eventually got disqualified, because one of our other teammates dropped off the face of the earth, but it was fun while it lasted.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ Praise for After the Outing" hide="- collapse"]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
fuck me this is good

[[>]]
[[*user TroutMaskReplica]]
[[/>]]
[[/div]]
[[/collapsible]]

-----

[[module ListPages name="Chairs"]]
+++ [[[Chairs]]] [[size 60%]]//(+%%rating%%)//[[/size]]
[[/module]]

> //I am no longer convinced these are normal chairs.//

[[collapsible show="+ Author's Commentary" hide="- collapse"]]
This was what I consider to be my first big break as an author. It honestly felt surreal to go into the discord and see people talking about this one and recommending it to each other, and overall the attention and absolute love this has gotten is nothing short of breathtaking for me.

As the for the piece itself? It was a 30-minute shitpost that I posted at 1 AM expecting it to get 6 upvotes and move on. So, uhh, yeah. I guess miracles can happen.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ Praise for Chairs" hide="- collapse"]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
Enjoyably stupid!

[[>]]
- [[*user Mister_Toasty]]
[[/>]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
Never before have mine eyes laid upon such a literary masterpiece.

[[>]]
- [[*user Captain_Wavzies]]
[[/>]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
I have no idea what the fuck I just read, but I laughed my ass out of my chair and then got back up to find three chairs in its place.

[[>]]
- [[*user Doctor Fullham]]
[[/>]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
Lusofar, Highest of Chairs, God of the Adirondacks, Who sits Upon the Throne Throne would be pleased to learn of this.

[[>]]
- [[*user Billith]]
[[/>]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
chair time

[[>]]
- [[*user JPTCW]]
[[/>]]
[[/div]]
[[/collapsible]]

-----

[[/tab]]
[[tab Order by Popularity]]
